title: GitHub security advisory (AV25-368)
description: On June 18, 2025, GitHub published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.17.x prior to 3.17.1
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.16.x prior to 3.16.4
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.15.x prior to 3.15.8
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.14.x prior to 3.14.13
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.13.x prior to 3.13.16
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
